home.title: MBTI AI Recommendation
home.description: Starting the test will overwrite previously saved results.

start.title: Start Test
start.description: Run a new MBTI test, choose interest keywords, and generate recommendations.

result.title: View Result
result.description: Check your latest saved MBTI/job recommendation result immediately.

result.title: MBTI-Based Recommendation Result
result.intro: AI recommendations based on your score profile and selected keywords.
result.emptyMessage: No saved job recommendations. Please run the test first.
result.fallbackReasonWithKeywords: {jobName} is recommended based on your {mbtiType} profile and interests like {keywords}.
result.fallbackReasonWithoutKeywords: {jobName} is recommended based on your {mbtiType} profile and work preferences.

messages.noSavedResult: No saved result. Please complete the test first.
messages.submitFailed: An error occurred while submitting MBTI answers.
messages.createRecommendationFailed: An error occurred while generating recommendation results.
